p: Despite potential correlation between 2 of the estimated parameters ( Î² and l), reproduction numbers were estimated with good precision ( Fig. 3 ). Both epidemiological scenarios indicated that the average transmissibility of secondary MERS-CoV cases remains below the critical threshold of 1.0 and underscored the importance of hospital-based transmission, estimated to be over 4-fold higher than community-based transmission for both index and secondary cases ( Table 2 ).
